languages.text: "Нет нужды в этом вопросе". {n}Лицо преподобного приобретает выражение непостижимой мудрости и спокойствия.{/n} "Судьбы наши — в руках Императора, и Он ведает дела свои".
"An irrelevant question." {n}His face takes on an expression of fathomless wisdom and calm.{/n} "Our fates are in the Emperor's hands, and He does as His plans require."
languages.original_text: "Нет нужды в этом вопросе". {n}Лицо преподобного приобретает выражение непостижимой мудрости и спокойствия.{/n} "Судьбы наши — в руках Императора, и Он ведает дела свои".

traits.locale_text: "That question is unnecessary." {n}The reverend's face takes on an expression of fathomless wisdom and calm.{/n} "Our fates are in the Emperor's hands, and He knows His ways."
"That question is unnecessary." {n}The reverend's face takes on an expression of fathomless wisdom and calm.{/n} "Our fates are in the Emperor's hands, and He knows His ways."
"An irrelevant question." {n}The reverend's face takes on an expression of fathomless wisdom and calm.{/n} "Our fates are in the Emperor's hands, and He does as His plans require."

"An irrelevant question." {n}His face takes on an expression of fathomless wisdom and calm.{/n} "Our fates are in the Emperor's hands, and He does as His plans require."
"An irrelevant question." {n}His face takes on an expression of fathomless wisdom and calm.{/n} "Our fates are in the Emperor's hands, and He does as His plans require."

languages.text: « Cette question n'a pas lieu d'être posée. Nos destins sont entre les mains de l'Empereur, qui agit comme Ses desseins le requièrent, » {n}répond-il calmement, avec une expression dégageant une profonde sagesse.{/n}
languages.original_text: "An irrelevant question." {n}His face takes on an expression of fathomless wisdom and calm.{/n} "Our fates are in the Emperor's hands, and He does as His plans require."

traits.locale_text: « Cette question n'a pas lieu d'être posée. Nos destins sont entre les mains de l'Empereur, qui agit comme Ses desseins le requièrent, » {n}répond-il calmement, avec une expression dégageant une profonde sagesse.{/n}

languages.text: «Es una pregunta irrelevante». {n}Su rostro adopta una expresión de insondable sabiduría y calma.{/n} «Nuestro destino está en manos del Emperador, y Él obra según sus planes».
languages.original_text: "An irrelevant question." {n}His face takes on an expression of fathomless wisdom and calm.{/n} "Our fates are in the Emperor's hands, and He does as His plans require."

traits.locale_text: «Es una pregunta irrelevante». {n}Su rostro adopta una expresión de insondable sabiduría y calma.{/n} «Nuestro destino está en manos del Emperador, y Él obra según sus planes».

languages.text: “这是个无关紧要的问题。”{n}牧师一脸平静，流露着深不可测的智慧。{/n}“我们所有人的命运都掌握在帝皇手中，祂会按照祂的计划安排我们。”
languages.original_text: "An irrelevant question." {n}His face takes on an expression of fathomless wisdom and calm.{/n} "Our fates are in the Emperor's hands, and He does as His plans require."

traits.locale_text: “这是个无关紧要的问题。”{n}牧师一脸平静，流露着深不可测的智慧。{/n}“我们所有人的命运都掌握在帝皇手中，祂会按照祂的计划安排我们。”

languages.text: 「無関係な質問だ」{n}彼の顔は、底知れぬ知恵と冷静さを帯びている。{/n}私たちの運命は、皇帝が決めること。彼が必要な事、計画している事を実行するだけだ。
languages.original_text: "An irrelevant question." {n}His face takes on an expression of fathomless wisdom and calm.{/n} "Our fates are in the Emperor's hands, and He does as His plans require."

traits.locale_text: 「無関係な質問だ」{n}彼の顔は、底知れぬ知恵と冷静さを帯びている。{/n}私たちの運命は、皇帝が決めること。彼が必要な事、計画している事を実行するだけだ。

languages.text: "Eine irrelevante Frage." {n}Sein Gesicht nimmt einen Ausdruck grenzenloser Weisheit und Ruhe an.{/n} "Unser Schicksal liegt in den Händen des Imperators, und er tut, was sein Plan gebietet."
languages.original_text: "An irrelevant question." {n}His face takes on an expression of fathomless wisdom and calm.{/n} "Our fates are in the Emperor's hands, and He does as His plans require."

traits.locale_text: "Eine irrelevante Frage." {n}Sein Gesicht nimmt einen Ausdruck grenzenloser Weisheit und Ruhe an.{/n} "Unser Schicksal liegt in den Händen des Imperators, und er tut, was sein Plan gebietet."

languages.text: "Önemsiz bir soru." {n}Yüzünde derin bir bilgelik ve dinginlik ifadesi oluşuyor.{/n} "Kaderlerimiz İmparator'un elindedir ve O, planları neyi gerektiriyorsa onu yapar."
languages.original_text: "An irrelevant question." {n}His face takes on an expression of fathomless wisdom and calm.{/n} "Our fates are in the Emperor's hands, and He does as His plans require."
